name: Phish Upon a Star
description:
Created for https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-91-ufo.

You are sitting upon a bench overlooking a city at night. Your city.

You hum a tune to yourself and notice three UFOs rudely interrupt the peace and quiet. They begin to line up an attack run on the poor poor people in the city. Fortunately, you are a world-class phishing hacktivist. You whip out your laptop and begin lining up your counter-attack.

INSTRUCTIONS

1. After beginning a wave the first thing you must do is land a click on the erratically moving UFO.

2. Now the phishing begins, you must select the most viable option based on the aliens' profile.

- Don't let the city take too much damage (represented by the line at the bottom

- The UFO will continue to fire whilst you are phishing so don't let up!

- Enjoy!

This was hastily uploaded for the sake of the jam. I plan to include in-game instructions and a more engaging UFO clicking phase.
